description: A vast collection of over 50,000 books, journals, magazines, and digital resources. Fully air-conditioned reading halls with modern amenities.
timings: Monday-Saturday: 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Sunday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

description: State-of-the-art computer center with 500+ high-speed computers, latest software, and high-speed internet connectivity.
Google Developer Group chapter promoting technology education through workshops, hackathons, and community events.
24x7 medical facility with qualified doctors and nurses. Emergency ambulance service available. Basic medicines and first aid.
Multi-sport complex with facilities for cricket, football, basketball, volleyball, badminton, table tennis, and gym.
Hygienic cafeteria serving variety of food items including South Indian, North Indian, Chinese, and beverages at affordable prices.
On-campus shopping complex with stationary shop, photocopy center, book store, general store, and salon.
Punjab National Bank branch with ATM facility available 24x7 for students and staff.
University post office for all postal services including speed post and courier.
Modern auditorium with seating capacity of 1000, equipped with audio-visual systems and air conditioning.
University bus service connecting Ferozepur city and nearby areas with multiple routes covering major locations.
timings: Morning: 7:30 AM - 9:30 AM, Evening: 4:30 PM - 6:30 PM

description: Separate parking facilities for students and staff with security. Two-wheeler and four-wheeler parking available.
Comfortable guest house for visiting faculty, dignitaries, and parents with AC and non-AC rooms.
